Spanish Linguistics: The study of the structure, history, acquisition, and variation of the Spanish language.
Latin American Literatures & Cultures: The study of the diverse literary and cultural traditions of Spanish-speaking America, from the colonial period to the present.
Iberian (Spanish) Literatures & Cultures: The study of the literary and cultural traditions of Spain, from medieval to contemporary.
Portuguese (Luso-Brazilian) Studies: The study of the languages, literatures, and cultures of Portugal and Brazil.
